title: Contribution to the OAS-AICMA program “Assistance to victims of antipersonnel mines in Colombia 2022-2023”
description: The proposal aims at mitigating the impact of anti-personnel mines and other explosive devices on the Colombian territory, through actions seeking to support the physical and psychological rehabilitation, vocational training and the implementation of microprojects for the strengthening of livelihoods for landmine victims, their families and communities.
